## Undocumented Composables

The following VueUse composables have not yet been scraped and documented locally.

### Notes on Documented Composables
- ✅ **State, Component, Watch, and Utilities** categories are now fully documented
- ✅ **@vueuse/motion** package fully documented (23 files)
- ✅ **@vueuse/math** package fully documented (15 composables)
- ⚠️ **useSlots/useAttrs** are built-in Vue 3 APIs, not VueUse composables
- ⚠️ **useStoragePlain** doesn't exist; use `useStorage` with custom serializers
- ⚠️ **isServer** doesn't exist; use `!isClient` instead
- ⚠️ **useEventBus** is not in VueUse core; use mitt or tiny-emitter libraries

### State (Additional composables)
- **createSharedComposable** - Make composable usable with multiple Vue instances
- **injectLocal** - Extended inject with ability to call provideLocal
- **provideLocal** - Extended provide with ability to call injectLocal
- **useDebouncedRefHistory** - Shorthand for useRefHistory with debounced filter
- **useLastChanged** - Records the timestamp of the last change
- **useThrottledRefHistory** - Shorthand for useRefHistory with throttled filter

### Elements (Additional composables)
- **useMutationObserver** - Watch for changes being made to the DOM tree
- **useParentElement** - Get parent element of the given element

### Browser (Additional composables)
- **useBroadcastChannel** - Reactive BroadcastChannel API
- **useBrowserLocation** - Reactive browser location
- **useClipboardItems** - Reactive Clipboard API (items version)
- **useEyeDropper** - Reactive EyeDropper API
- **useGamepad** - Provides reactive bindings for the Gamepad API
- **useMediaControls** - Reactive media controls for both audio and video elements
- **usePerformanceObserver** - Observe performance metrics
- **usePreferredReducedTransparency** - Reactive prefers-reduced-transparency media query
- **useScreenOrientation** - Reactive Screen Orientation API
- **useScreenSafeArea** - Reactive env(safe-area-inset-*)
- **useSSRWidth** - Set global viewport width for SSR components
- **useTextareaAutosize** - Automatically update textarea height based on content
- **useUrlSearchParams** - Reactive URLSearchParams
- **useVibrate** - Reactive Vibration API
- **useWakeLock** - Reactive Screen Wake Lock API
- **useWebNotification** - Reactive Notification API
- **useWebWorker** - Simple Web Workers registration and communication
- **useWebWorkerFn** - Run expensive functions without blocking the UI

### Sensors (Additional composables)
- **onElementRemoval** - Fires when element or any containing element is removed
- **onStartTyping** - Fires when users start typing on non-editable elements
- **useDevicePixelRatio** - Reactively track window.devicePixelRatio
- **useDevicesList** - Reactive enumerateDevices listing available input/output devices
- **useDisplayMedia** - Reactive mediaDevices.getDisplayMedia streaming
- **useElementByPoint** - Reactive element by point
- **useFocus** - Reactive utility to track or set focus state of a DOM element
- **useFps** - Reactive FPS (frames per second)
- **useMousePressed** - Reactive mouse pressing state
- **useNavigatorLanguage** - Reactive navigator.language
- **usePageLeave** - Reactive state to show whether mouse leaves the page
- **useParallax** - Create parallax effect easily
- **usePointerLock** - Reactive pointer lock
- **useScrollLock** - Lock scrolling of the element
- **useSpeechRecognition** - Reactive SpeechRecognition
- **useSpeechSynthesis** - Reactive SpeechSynthesis
- **useTextSelection** - Reactively track user text selection based on Window.getSelection
- **useUserMedia** - Reactive mediaDevices.getUserMedia streaming

### Network (Additional composables)
- **useEventSource** - EventSource or Server-Sent-Events instance

### Component (Additional composables)
- **computedInject** - Combine computed and inject
- **createTemplatePromise** - Template as Promise
- **tryOnBeforeMount** - Safe onBeforeMount
- **tryOnBeforeUnmount** - Safe onBeforeUnmount
- **unrefElement** - Retrieves the underlying DOM element from a Vue ref or component instance
- **useVirtualList** - Create virtual lists with ease
- **useVModels** - Shorthand for props v-model binding

### Watch (Additional composables)
- **watchDeep** - Shorthand for watching value with {deep: true}
- **watchImmediate** - Shorthand for watching value with {immediate: true}

### Reactivity (Additional composables)
- **computedAsync** - Computed for async functions
- **computedEager** - Eager computed without lazy evaluation
- **computedWithControl** - Explicitly define the dependencies of computed
- **createRef** - Returns a deepRef or shallowRef depending on the deep param
- **reactifyObject** - Apply reactify to an object
- **refAutoReset** - A ref which will be reset to the default value after some time
- **refDebounced** - Debounce execution of a ref value
- **refDefault** - Apply default value to a ref
- **refManualReset** - Create a ref with manual reset functionality
- **refThrottled** - Throttle changing of a ref value
- **refWithControl** - Fine-grained controls over ref and its reactivity
- **toRef** - Normalize value/ref/getter to ref or computed

### Array (Additional composables)
- **useArrayEvery** - Reactive Array.every
- **useArrayFindLast** - Reactive Array.findLast
- **useArrayIncludes** - Reactive Array.includes
- **useArrayJoin** - Reactive Array.join
- **useArraySome** - Reactive Array.some

### Time (Additional composables)
- **useTimeAgoIntl** - Reactive time ago with i18n supported

### Utilities (Additional composables)
- **createUnrefFn** - Make a plain function accepting ref and raw values as arguments
- **get** - Shorthand for accessing ref.value
- **makeDestructurable** - Make isomorphic destructurable for object and array at the same time
- **set** - Shorthand for ref.value = x
- **useMemoize** - Cache results of functions depending on arguments and keep it reactive
- **useOffsetPagination** - Reactive offset pagination
- **usePrevious** - Holds the previous value of a ref
- **useStepper** - Provides helpers for building a multi-step wizard interface
- **useSupported** - SSR compatibility isSupported
- **useTimeoutPoll** - Use timeout to poll something

### @Router Package (3 composables)
- **useRouteQuery** - Reactive route query parameters
- **useRouteParams** - Reactive route params
- **useRouteHash** - Reactive route hash

### @Integrations Package (12 composables)
- **useAsyncValidator** - Wrapper for async-validator
- **useAxios** - Wrapper for axios
- **useChangeCase** - Reactive wrapper for change-case
- **useCookies** - Wrapper for universal-cookie
- **useDrauu** - Reactive instance for drauu
- **useFocusTrap** - Reactive wrapper for focus-trap
- **useFuse** - Easily implement fuzzy search using a composable with Fuse.js
- **useIDBKeyval** - Wrapper for idb-keyval
- **useJwt** - Wrapper for jwt-decode
- **useNProgress** - Reactive wrapper for nprogress
- **useQRCode** - Wrapper for qrcode
- **useSortable** - Wrapper for sortable

### @RxJS Package (7 composables)
- **from** - Wrappers around RxJS's from() and fromEvent()
- **toObserver** - Sugar function to convert a ref into an RxJS Observer
- **useExtractedObservable** - Use an RxJS Observable as extracted from one or more composables
- **useObservable** - Use an RxJS Observable
- **useSubject** - Bind an RxJS Subject to a ref and propagate value changes both ways
- **useSubscription** - Use an RxJS Subscription without worrying about unsubscribing
- **watchExtractedObservable** - Watch the values of an RxJS Observable as extracted from composables

### @Electron Package (5 composables)
- **useIpcRenderer** - Provides ipcRenderer and all of its APIs
- **useIpcRendererInvoke** - Reactive ipcRenderer.invoke API result
- **useIpcRendererOn** - Use ipcRenderer.on with ease and ipcRenderer.removeListener automatically on unmounted
- **useZoomFactor** - Reactive WebFrame zoom factor
- **useZoomLevel** - Reactive WebFrame zoom level

### @Firebase Package (3 composables)
- **useAuth** - Reactive Firebase Auth binding
- **useFirestore** - Reactive Firestore binding
- **useRTDB** - Reactive Firebase Realtime Database binding

### @Head Package (2 composables)
- **createHead** - Create the head manager instance
- **useHead** - Update head meta tags reactively

### @SchemaOrg Package (2 composables)
- **createSchemaOrg** - Create the schema.org manager instance
- **useSchemaOrg** - Update schema.org reactively

### @Sound Package (1 composable)
- **useSound** - Play sound effects reactively

# VueUse Functions Index

This document lists all the VueUse composables that have been scraped and saved to this directory.

## State Management

- **useStorage** - Reactive LocalStorage/SessionStorage with auto persistence
- **useLocalStorage** - Reactive LocalStorage wrapper
- **useSessionStorage** - Reactive SessionStorage wrapper
- **useStorageAsync** - Async storage for IndexedDB and other async backends
- **useAsyncState** - Reactive async state, triggers changes once promise is ready
- **createGlobalState** - Create global shared state across Vue instances
- **createInjectionState** - Create global state with provider/consumer pattern
- **useCookies** - Reactive cookie management (wrapper for universal-cookie)

## Browser

- **useDark** - Reactive dark mode with auto data persistence
- **useColorMode** - Reactive color mode (dark/light/custom) with auto data persistence
- **useClipboard** - Reactive Clipboard API for copy/paste operations
- **useEventListener** - Easy addEventListener on mounted, auto removeEventListener on unmounted
- **useMediaQuery** - Reactive Media Query for responsive design
- **useBreakpoints** - Reactive viewport breakpoints
- **usePreferredDark** - Reactive dark theme preference detection
- **usePreferredColorScheme** - Reactive prefers-color-scheme media query
- **usePreferredContrast** - Reactive prefers-contrast media query
- **usePreferredReducedMotion** - Reactive prefers-reduced-motion media query
- **usePreferredLanguages** - Reactive Navigator Languages for user's preferred languages
- **usePermission** - Reactive Permissions API
- **useShare** - Reactive Web Share API
- **useFullscreen** - Reactive Fullscreen API for entering/exiting fullscreen mode
- **useEyeDropper** - Reactive EyeDropper API for color picking
- **useBroadcastChannel** - Reactive BroadcastChannel API for cross-tab communication
- **useFileDialog** - Open file dialogs with ease
- **useFileSystemAccess** - Create, read, and write local files with FileSystemAccess API
- **useMemory** - Reactive memory info tracking
- **useDocumentVisibility** - Reactively track document.visibilityState
- **useBluetooth** - Reactive Web Bluetooth API for BLE peripherals
- **useTitle** - Reactive document title
- **useFavicon** - Reactive favicon
- **useTextDirection** - Reactive text direction (ltr/rtl)
- **useCssVar** - Manipulate CSS variables reactively
- **useStyleTag** - Inject reactive style tag
- **useScriptTag** - Inject reactive script tag
- **useCached** - Cache a ref with custom comparator
- **useObjectUrl** - Reactive URL for Blob/File/MediaSource objects
- **useImage** - Reactive image loading with fallback support

## Network

- **useFetch** - Reactive Fetch API with abort, intercept, and auto-refetch capabilities
- **useWebSocket** - Reactive WebSocket connection

## Elements

- **useElementSize** - Reactive size of an HTML element using ResizeObserver

- **useElementBounding** - Reactive bounding box of an HTML element
- **useElementHover** - Reactive element hover state

- **useCurrentElement** - Get current component's root element
- **useActiveElement** - Reactive document.activeElement

- **onClickOutside** - Listen for clicks outside of an element (useful for modals/dropdowns)

- **onLongPress** - Listen for long press on elements

## Component

## Time

- **useToggle** - Boolean switcher with utility functions
- **until** - Promised one-time watch for changes
- **whenever** - Shorthand for watching with truthiness condition

- **toReactive** - Converts ref to reactive, creates "swappable" reactive objects

- **reactiveComputed** - Returns reactive object instead of ref from computed
- **reactiveOmit** - Reactively omit fields from reactive objects
- **reactivePick** - Reactively pick fields from reactive objects
- **syncRef** - Two-way ref synchronization with transform support
- **syncRefs** - Keep multiple target refs in sync with a source ref
- **reactify** - Converts plain functions into reactive functions
- **extendRef** - Add extra attributes to refs with unwrap support

## Utilities

- **useCounter** - Basic counter with utility functions
- **useCycleList** - Cycle through a list of items
- **useCloned** - Reactive clone of a ref
- **useBase64** - Reactive base64 transformation
- **useEventBus** - Global event bus for component communication (Note: Not in VueUse, use mitt or tiny-emitter)
- **createSharedComposable** - Make composable usable with multiple Vue instances
- **useAsyncQueue** - Execute async tasks sequentially
- **useIntervalFn** - setInterval wrapper with controls

- **useToNumber** - Reactive type casting to number

- **createEventHook** - Create event hooks with on/off/trigger API

## Array

- **useArrayFilter** - Reactive Array.filter implementation
- **useArrayMap** - Reactive Array.map implementation
- **useArrayReduce** - Reactive Array.reduce implementation
- **useArrayFind** - Reactive Array.find implementation
- **useArrayFindIndex** - Reactive Array.findIndex implementation
- **useArrayUnique** - Reactive unique array with custom comparison
- **useArrayDifference** - Reactive array difference with symmetric option
- **useSorted** - Reactive array sorting with dirty mode

## @vueuse/motion - Animation Package

### Core Composables
- **useMotion** - Programmatic motion control with variants
- **useSpring** - Spring physics animations
- **useMotions** - Access named motion instances
- **useMotionProperties** - Manage motion properties
- **useMotionVariants** - Define and control animation variants
- **useMotionTransitions** - Configure transition settings
- **useMotionControls** - Animation control functions (play, pause, stop)
- **useMotionFeatures** - Register custom motion features

### Directives
- **v-motion** - Declarative animations with variants (initial, enter, visible, hovered, focused, tapped)
- **20+ preset directives** - fade, pop, slide variants (fadeIn, popUp, slideLeft, rollRight, etc.)

### Components
- **Motion** - Single element animation wrapper
- **MotionGroup** - Multiple elements animation wrapper

### Utilities
- **useElementStyle** - Sync element styles reactively
- **useElementTransform** - Sync element transforms reactively
- **reactiveStyle** - Reactive style helper
- **reactiveTransform** - Reactive transform helper

### Features
- Variant system for state-based animations
- Spring physics with stiffness/damping controls
- Gesture support (hover, focus, tap)
- Orchestration with delay/stagger
- 20+ built-in animation presets
- SSR compatible

## @vueuse/math - Mathematical Operations

### Aggregation
- **useSum** - Reactive sum of array of numbers
- **useAverage** - Reactive average calculation
- **useMin** - Reactive Math.min
- **useMax** - Reactive Math.max

### Rounding
- **useFloor** - Reactive Math.floor
- **useCeil** - Reactive Math.ceil
- **useRound** - Reactive Math.round
- **useTrunc** - Reactive Math.trunc

### Mathematical Operations
- **useAbs** - Reactive Math.abs
- **useClamp** - Reactively clamp number within range
- **usePrecision** - Set number precision with configurable rounding
- **useProjection** - Map value from one range to another

### Logic Operations
- **logicAnd** - Reactive logical AND (alias: `and`)
- **logicOr** - Reactive logical OR (alias: `or`)
- **logicNot** - Reactive logical NOT (alias: `not`)

## Usage Notes

### Nuxt 3 Compatibility

Some composables like `useFetch` and `useStorage` are NOT auto-imported in Nuxt 3 to avoid conflicts with Nuxt's built-in composables. Use explicit imports:

```ts
import { useFetch, useStorage } from '@vueuse/core'
```

### Component Versions

Many functions provide renderless component versions via `@vueuse/components`:

```vue
<template>
  <UseMouse v-slot="{ x, y }">
    x: {{ x }}
    y: {{ y }}
  </UseMouse>
</template>
```

### Directive Versions

Some functions also provide directive versions:

```vue
<script setup>
import { vElementSize } from '@vueuse/components'

function onResize({ width, height }) {
  console.log(width, height)
}
</script>

<template>
  <div v-element-size="onResize" />
</template>
```

All documentation was scraped from [https://vueuse.org](https://vueuse.org) on October 1-2, 2025.

- Function overview and description
- Basic usage examples
- Configuration options
- Component and directive usage (when available)
- Type declarations
- Links to source code

### How to Add More Documentation

To scrape additional composables, use the firecrawl MCP tool:

firecrawl_scrape({
  url: "https://vueuse.org/core/[composableName]",

Then save to `claude-docs/vue/[composableName].md` and add to this index.
